title: Nortak Software

images:

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Nortak Software. The average
  contract duration was 2.12 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $386.9K. The longest
  contract was 5.3 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.4M.
lookup_name: 'NORTAK SOFTWARE'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '23'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '48%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '203%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.0M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.12'
s421_mean_contract_value: '386.9K'
s425_max_duration: '5.3'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.4M'
---
